card_pen_effect: Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up Special Summoned monster on the field; its ATK and DEF become equal to its current ATK or DEF (whichever is lower) until the end of this turn (even if this card leaves the field).
card_text: Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; switch its current ATK and DEF (until the end of this turn), then take 500 damage.
